summary: Add information about vuln. package versions for CVE-2023-21893
details:
Relevant package:
https://www.nuget.org/packages/Oracle.ManagedDataAccess
Vulnerable until incl. [21.8.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Oracle.ManagedDataAccess/21.8.0)
Fixed from incl. [21.9.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Oracle.ManagedDataAccess/21.9.0)

See the readme.txt inside the 21.9.0 .nupkg, which reads:

Bug Fixes since Oracle.ManagedDataAccess NuGet Package 21.8.0
=============================================================
[...]
Bug 34617083 RESOLVE CVE-2023-21893
